title: Prodea Systems to Demonstrate Unprecedented Internet of Thi
text:
NEW ORLEANS , Oct. Cable-Tec Expo -- Prodea announced today that it will be exhibiting at the SCTE Cable-Tec Expo from October 13 th to 16 th in New Orleans . Prodea will be located at the TVC Communications (a division of WESCO International, Inc.) exhibiting area. Prodea, a key solutions provider of the latest Connected Home technology, will showcase their state of the art ROS® platform and provide demonstrations of their next generation Connected Home services that are easily deployed to end users on their favorite devices – with a focus on seamless interconnectivity and user-friendly experiences throughout the entire home. "Prodea understands that end users are looking for new, innovative ways to connect and engage with emerging Connected Home technologies," said Andrew Tauhert , Executive Vice-President of Marketing and Business Development at Prodea. "The integration of new services with an emphasis on both quick deployment and time to market is imperative in order to respond to the ever increasing demand for new services and accessories. With Prodea's ROS® platform, service providers and their partners can deliver turnkey services to their users with no hassle, simplified billing and provisioning as well as fully integrated management systems resulting in service delivery excellence and increased revenue generation."
In another prevailing example of how Prodea is visioning the future through innovation by foreseeing the services that users want most, Prodea recently announced that ROS® is now available with Thread 1.0 and Voice Control features, securing Prodea as the first to market these Connected Home services to global customers – now providing users with full control of their connected lives with the power of their voice.
"ROS® is fully integrated with entertainment, healthcare, security and communications systems. This results in a seamless, intuitive and optimal user experience," continued Tauhert. "ROS® now provides companies like Cable, Telecommunications and Electric Service providers with a proven inroad to the Internet of Things: a cloud based, end-to-end platform that integrates existing and new services as well as a suite of ROS® Connected Life experiences that are easily deployed. It is the most complete multi-service, multi-platform and multi-screen offering available in the industry today."
Prodea Systems will be providing demonstrations of the total offering in the TVC Communications exhibiting area located at booth number 643. To book a meeting or demo session with Prodea at SCTE, please contact Mario Pino at +1-214-278-1760 or mario.pino@prodea.com
To see what our partners are saying about Prodea Systems and ROS click here .
About the Prodea Residential Operating System (ROS®) Platform
The first-of-its-kind in within the IoT market, Prodea's ROS® bridges the gap between people and technology by enabling total control of their connected life services through one convenient and elegant user interface. ROS® provides the apps and services people want -- changing the way consumers access the Internet, enjoy entertainment content, control the smart home and receive healthcare, education and other quality of life services -- anytime, anywhere and on any device. This not only improves everyday experiences, but anticipates the ever-changing needs of consumers' digital lifestyles, helping service providers attract and maintain subscribers for life while delivering seamless access to a range of content and services limited only by the imagination.
About Prodea Systems:
Prodea delivers products and services that empower people to easily command their connected lives. Prodea was the first company to make a seamlessly connected life possible and deliver on the promise of the connected home, for everyone, with mass-market services that matter. The Prodea Residential Operating System (ROS®) is a unified platform for the Internet of Things that enables diverse Service Providers worldwide to rapidly and cost-effectively deliver autonomous, agnostic and easy-to-use connectivity and services between people, data and devices.
ROS® is a managed service delivery platform agnostic of connection, service, application, and protocol, solving the challenges that both traditional and non-traditional service providers face in delivering the Internet of Things to consumers. This approach to the Internet of Things makes the ROS® platform a far more viable proposition in the immediate short term by creating a new world where services, devices, and data can be exchanged seamlessly. Prodea's software and service platform's current deployments span Africa , Europe , Latin America , the Middle East , Southeast Asia and the United States .
Headquartered in Richardson, Texas , Prodea maintains additional offices in New York ; Los Angeles ; Mumbai ; London ; Dubai, United Arab Emirates ; and Johannesburg . For more information about Prodea Systems, please visit: www.prodea.com or contact Andrew Tauhert at +1-214-278-1876.
